Adwi Aylin exit.
𝗀𝗁𝗈𝗌𝗍 𝗉𝗋𝗂𝗇𝖼𝖾𝗌𝗌

❝The people you love become ghosts inside of you, and like this you keep them alive.❜❜

— Rob Montgomery

Yuffie

Name: Naila

Age: 30

City: Lleida

Like: Ghosts

Dislike: Chaos

I was such a sullen, angry, sad kid. I'm sure there are writers who have had happy childhoods, but what are you going to write about? No ghosts, no fear. I'm very happy that I had an unhappy and uncomfortable childhood.

At night, here in the library,

the ghosts have voices.

They say that shadows of deceased ghosts Do haunt the houses and the graves about, Of such whose life's lamp went untimely out, Delighting still in their forsaken hosts.
